statements: DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND product_id = 101;
DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND loyalty_points < 1000;
DELETE FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 100 AND product_id = 200;
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id = 300 AND available_quantity < reorder_threshold;
